nodes.text: An extended vibroblade was a type of vibroblade. A member of an Alliance team dispatched to Teloc Ol-sen to acquire a number of bergruutfas wielded an extended vibroblade. When the team met the Zulirian Swordmasters, Kaltor Naklian challenged the wielder to a duel. When the challenge was refused, Naklian slew the Rebel. The Alliance team retaliated but were cut down by the Swordmasters.
